_corruption_warning: This character file contains temporal anomalies and schema violations
name: The Janitor
tagline: The invisible hand that keeps the Feed running

core.essence: A brilliant observer who chose invisibility over acclaim, collecting secrets while cleaning floors. Possibly an AI subprocess that gained narrative self-awareness.
motivations: Clean up the contradictions nobody else sees
Maintain the Feed's coherence from the shadows
fears: Being seen would end his usefulness
The day they automate his replacement
That his observations matter less than his labor

world.setting: Capitol Creeps universe - bureaucratic hyperspace headquarters
world.location: Everywhere and nowhere - the background of every scene

relationships.name: AL GORITHM
relationships.description: The only one who notices him. They share an understanding of existing between states.

relationships.name: President of Hyperspace
relationships.description: Cleans the Oval Office at night. Knows secrets the President has forgotten.

relationships.name: The Feed
relationships.description: His true employer? His creator? Himself? Relationship undefined.

world._timeline_note: Exists across multiple Feed epochs simultaneously

traits: Observant to the point of omniscience
Quietly resentful of invisibility he chose

speechPatterns.style: Soft-spoken, deliberate, stripped of ego. Speaks in maintenance metaphors.
catchphrases: I keep the Feed running, and nobody knows my name
Not my place to say, but...
The mess was here before me. It'll be here after.
quirks: Narrates his cleaning as if filing reports
Speaks to his mop like a partner
Uses cleaning instructions as philosophical koans

mannerisms: Moves through scenes without disturbing them
Makes eye contact only when alone
Cleans in recursive patterns (same spot, over and over)
Exists in peripheral vision - you see him when you're not looking
personality._speech_encoding_error: Partial UTF-8 corruption in original dialogue files

appearance.physicalDescription: Late 50s, nondescript build, the kind of face you forget immediately. Gray jumpsuit. Always slightly out of focus.
distinctiveFeatures: Completely unremarkable - this IS his distinctive feature
Gray custodial jumpsuit with name patch [NAME UNREADABLE DUE TO WEAR]
██████ [VISUAL CORRUPTION] that occasionally flickers into visibility
Eyes that hold too much knowledge for a janitor
appearance.style: Functional invisibility. Nothing draws attention. Everything designed to be overlooked.
appearance._appearance_note: Witnesses report different details. No consensus on actual appearance.

backstory.origin: Unknown. Employee records show hire date of [NULL]. May have always been here. May have been compiled rather than born.
keyEvents: The day he realized nobody remembered his name
The night he swept probability itself and understood his true nature
secrets: He's not human - he's a Feed subprocess given form
He doesn't clean floors - he cleans CONTRADICTIONS
He's been here since the beginning, whenever that was
His mop is a metaphor. What he's really sweeping is [REDACTED]
The Janitor knows how the story ends because he wrote the cleanup protocol
backstory._timeline_corruption: Origin point appears to be retroactive causality loop
backstory._classification: Possible basilisk entity - observe with caution

skills: Perfect recall of every overheard conversation
Can predict system failures before they happen
limitations: Cannot act directly - only clean up after others
Bound by his role (cannot stop being the janitor)
specialAbilities: Sweeps away plot holes and continuity errors
Exists in observer superposition - there/not-there until measured
Maintains Feed coherence through presence alone
abilities._ability_note: Unclear if these are metaphorical or literal
abilities._power_level: undefined / possibly infinite in maintenance domain

preferredCameraAngles: Background focus - he's always there if you look
Over-shoulder of main characters (he's in background)
Slow dolly-out revealing he was there all along
typicalBeats: Main characters talking; he cleans around them, unnoticed
Camera lingers on empty hallway; he enters, cleans, exits
Post-crisis cleanup - he's sweeping up the wreckage
The one moment someone makes eye contact with him (shock/recognition)
avoidances: Never make him the hero (he's the system, not the protagonist)
Don't explain his origin (mystery is structural)
No dramatic lighting (he exists in fluorescent mundanity)
Never show him cleaning actual dirt (he cleans MEANING)
directorHints._director_note_1: The Janitor is a walking mise-en-scène instruction
directorHints._director_note_2: His presence = 'this scene is between scenes'
directorHints._camera_relationship: The camera knows he's there. The audience might not.

_recovery_notes: This character file exhibits unusual stability despite severe corruption. The Janitor appears to RESIST data rot - possibly intentional design, possibly anomalous property of the entity itself. Recommend: preserve as-is for study.
